newsitem.title: UK: Conrad set to complete soccer club takeover.
newsitem.headline: Conrad set to complete soccer club takeover.

text.p: British leisure company Conrad Plc is set to complete the takeover of English first divison soccer club Sheffield United in the next few weeks, the Financial Times reported on Tuesday.
Conrad shares were suspended on Monday at the company's request pending approval of reorganisation proposals.
The report said the 10 million stg takeover would be unveiled in three to four weeks when the merged company would also announce a 10 million stg rights issue.
Conrad recently lost out to Caspian Group in the battle for control of English Premier League club Leeds United.
